title: SET_ENTITY_TRAFFICLIGHT_OVERRIDE
content:
0x57C5DB656185EAC40xC47F5B91// SetEntityTrafficlightOverride
void SET_ENTITY_TRAFFICLIGHT_OVERRIDE(Entity entity, int state);Changing traffic-lights will not change the behavior of NPCs.Example: hereenum eTrafficlightOverrideMode
{
    TLO_RED = 0,
    TLO_AMBER = 1,
    TLO_GREEN = 2,
    TLO_NONE = 3
}
codeBlocks:
// SetEntityTrafficlightOverride
void SET_ENTITY_TRAFFICLIGHT_OVERRIDE(Entity entity, int state);

local entity = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
-- Example usage for SET_ENTITY_TRAFFICLIGHT_OVERRIDE
SetEntityTrafficlightOverride(entity, 0)
